headline: Why Zebra (ZBRA) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of enterprise data capture company Zebra Technologies (NASDAQ:ZBRA) fell 3.4% in the afternoon session after it was caught in a broader market sell-off triggered by a federal court ruling on tariffs and rising bond yields. The downturn on Wall Street saw major indices like the Dow Jones, S&P 500, and Nasdaq all tumble, with tech stocks being among the hardest hit.
